name: io.github.panbanda/omen
description: Multi-language code analysis tools for complexity, technical debt, hotspots, ownership, and defect prediction

tools.name: analyze_complexity
tools.description: Measures cyclomatic and cognitive complexity of functions across a codebase

tools.name: analyze_churn
tools.description: Analyzes git history to identify files that change frequently

tools.name: analyze_hotspot
tools.description: Identifies hotspots: files with both high churn AND high complexity

tools.name: analyze_ownership
tools.description: Analyzes code ownership patterns and calculates bus factor risk

tools.name: analyze_defect
tools.description: Predicts defect probability using PMAT-weighted metrics

tools.name: analyze_changes
tools.description: Analyzes recent changes for defect risk using Just-in-Time prediction

tools.name: analyze_satd
tools.description: Detects self-admitted technical debt markers in code comments

tools.name: analyze_deadcode
tools.description: Identifies potentially unused functions, methods, and variables

tools.name: analyze_duplicates
tools.description: Detects code clones and duplicated code blocks

tools.name: analyze_graph
tools.description: Generates dependency graphs showing relationships between code modules

tools.name: analyze_smells
tools.description: Detects architectural smells: cycles, hubs, god components

tools.name: analyze_temporal_coupling
tools.description: Finds files that frequently change together in git history

tools.name: analyze_flags
tools.description: Detects feature flags in source code and analyzes them for staleness

tools.name: analyze_repo_map
tools.description: Generates a PageRank-weighted map of important symbols in the repository
